title: Freshwater Fish
description: Cast your knowledge into the world of rivers, lakes, and streams to learn about freshwater fish species.

questions.question: Which freshwater fish is the largest in North America?
Salmon are famous for doing what during their life cycle?
options: Returning to their birthplace to spawn

questions.question: The piranha, known for its sharp teeth, is native to rivers in which continent?
What is the most popular freshwater game fish in the United States?
The electric eel, which can generate up to 860 volts, is actually classified as what?
Which freshwater fish is known for 'walking' on land using its pectoral fins?
Lake Malawi in Africa is famous for having over 1,000 species of which type of fish?
The rainbow trout gets its name from what characteristic?
options: The colorful band along its side

questions.question: Which Asian freshwater fish can breathe air and survive out of water for extended periods?
The arapaima, one of the world's largest freshwater fish, is found in which river system?
What common aquarium fish was originally domesticated in China over a thousand years ago?
Which type of trout is native to the eastern United States and is the only trout native to the Appalachian Mountains?
The paddlefish uses its long snout primarily for what purpose?
Which invasive freshwater fish species has become a major problem in the Great Lakes of North America?
What is the practice of catching fish and then releasing them back into the water called?
